hero.title: Digital E Gram Panchayat
hero.subtitle: Empowering rural communities through digital governance. Access government services from the comfort of your home.

features.title: Why Choose Digital E Gram Panchayat?
features.subtitle: Experience the future of governance with our digital platform designed for efficiency, transparency, and citizen satisfaction.

secure.title: Secure & Transparent
secure.description: End-to-end encryption and transparent processes ensure your data is safe.

fast.title: Fast Processing
fast.description: Digital workflows reduce processing time from weeks to days.

mobile.title: Mobile Friendly
mobile.description: Access services anytime, anywhere from your mobile device.

citizen.title: Citizen Centric
citizen.description: Designed with citizens in mind for easy and intuitive use.

services.title: Available Services
services.subtitle: Access a wide range of government services digitally. No more long queues or multiple visits to government offices.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Digital Governance?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of citizens who have already transformed their government service experience with our digital platform.
